reasoning.step2:
I will not reveal internal chain-of-thought. Below are concise confidence estimates with brief evidence for each extracted field.

- GrandTotal.Amount — 95% confident. Evidence: "Endbetrag: 321,75 EUR" and "Zahlungsbetrag 321,75" clearly printed.

- Invoice.Date — 90% confident. Evidence: Two dates present: "Ausstellungsdatum 26.01.2024" and "Rechnungsdatum 29.01.2024"; extraction chose "29.01.2024" (Rechnungsdatum) which is a common invoice date field.

- Sender.VatId — 98% confident. Evidence: "UID ATU26011605" appears in sender contact block.

- Vat.Rate — 96% confident. Evidence: "Mehrwertsteuer: A 10,00% MwSt. auf ..." shows VAT rate as 10,00%. Per rules, percent symbol omitted when outputting numeric.

- Net.Amount — 95% confident. Evidence: "292,50 EUR" labeled near "Nettowert" and referenced in VAT calculation line.

- Vat.Amount — 95% confident. Evidence: "29,25 EUR" shown alongside the 10,00% VAT line as VAT amount.
